name: Army
responsibilities: Counts the number of active units

name: Board
responsibilities: Checks if the field is free
Counts the fields belonging to each army

name: Field
responsibilities: Stores information about units on the field
Stores information about belonging to the army

name: Unit
responsibilities: Defines the basic skills and characteristics of the units

name: Base_Unit
responsibilities: Stores the characteristics and skills of the base unit

name: Special_Unit_A
responsibilities: Stores the characteristics and skills of special unit A

name: Special_Unit_B
responsibilities: Stores the characteristics and skills of special unit B

name: Special_Unit_C
responsibilities: Stores the characteristics and skills of special unit C

name: Special_Unit_D
responsibilities: Stores the characteristics and skills of special unit D
